languages.text: "Да будет однажды очищена в мучениях душа Денза Беллардо, недостойного слуги Императора".
"May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."
languages.original_text: "Да будет однажды очищена в мучениях душа Денза Беллардо, недостойного слуги Императора".

traits.locale_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “愿有朝一日，帝皇卑劣的仆人，丹兹·贝拉多的灵魂能在痛苦中得到净化。”
languages.original_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."

traits.locale_text: “愿有朝一日，帝皇卑劣的仆人，丹兹·贝拉多的灵魂能在痛苦中得到净化。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Que el alma de Denz Bellardo, el indigno sirviente del Emperador, sea algún día purificada a través del sufrimiento».
languages.original_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."

traits.locale_text: «Que el alma de Denz Bellardo, el indigno sirviente del Emperador, sea algún día purificada a través del sufrimiento».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「皇帝の卑しむべき従者、デンツ・ベラルドの魂が、いつか苦しみによって浄化されることを祈ります」
languages.original_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝の卑しむべき従者、デンツ・ベラルドの魂が、いつか苦しみによって浄化されることを祈ります」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Möge die Seele von Denz Bellardo, dem unwürdigen Diener des Imperators, eines Tages durch Leid gereinigt sein."
languages.original_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."

traits.locale_text: "Möge die Seele von Denz Bellardo, dem unwürdigen Diener des Imperators, eines Tages durch Leid gereinigt sein."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Puisse l'âme de Denz Bellardo, serviteur indigne de l'Empereur, être un jour purifiée par la souffrance. »
languages.original_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."

traits.locale_text: « Puisse l'âme de Denz Bellardo, serviteur indigne de l'Empereur, être un jour purifiée par la souffrance. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "İmparator'un O'na layık olmayan hizmetkârı Denz Bellardo'nun ruhu, bir gün çektiği ızdıraplar ile temizlensin."
languages.original_text: "May the soul of Denz Bellardo, the Emperor's unworthy servant, one day be cleansed through suffering."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator'un O'na layık olmayan hizmetkârı Denz Bellardo'nun ruhu bir gün çektiği ızdıraplar ile temizlensin."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
